com.mobixell.xtt
Class UCPWorker

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.mobixell.xtt.UCPWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
SMSCWorker, UCPConstants, Runnable
public class UCPWorker
extends Thread
implements UCPConstants, SMSCWorker

UCPWorker. Processes a connection which has been received by the SMSCServer

Version:
$Id: UCPWorker.java,v 1.35 2010/03/18 05:30:40 rajesh Exp $
Author:
Roger Soder

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

UCPWorker

public UCPWorker(int id,
                 Socket se,
                 SMSCServer myServer,
                 int maxRequestCount,
                 int windowSize,
                 int responseDelay,
                 int maxSessions,
                 int sessionTimeout,
                 boolean injectAutoMessages,
                 int earliestAutoMessageSendTime,
                 int latestAutoMessageSendTime,
                 int autoMessageRetryTime)
Creates a new UCPWorker.

Parameters:
id - ID number of this worker thread
se - Socket of the connection
maxRequestCount - this number specifies how many requests will be accepted on the socket before it is closed. A negative number means, never close the socket.
windowSize - integer containing the window size of the connections
responseDelay - integer containing the number of miliseconds to wait before sending a response.
maxSessions - maximum number of sessions
sessionTimeout - integer in miliseconds
